homepage_aim: Predict the Market. Track Your Accuracy.
about_mission_text: StockPredictor was founded on the principle that the collective wisdom of informed individuals can be a powerful tool in navigating the financial markets. Our mission is to provide a platform where both novice investors and seasoned professionals can test their analytical skills, learn from the community, and build a transparent track record of their market predictions.
about_how_it_works_predict_text: Make predictions on thousands of assets with various timeframes, from hourly to yearly.
about_how_it_works_compete_text: Climb the leaderboards by making accurate predictions and prove your skills to the community.
about_how_it_works_follow_text: Follow top predictors to learn from their strategies and get notified about their new market moves.
about_how_it_works_golden_text: Become a Golden Member to offer exclusive content to your subscribers and build your brand.
about_how_it_works_track_text: Build a transparent, long-term track record of your performance across all timeframes and assets.
profile_watchlist_empty: This user is not watching any stocks yet.
profile_achievements_empty: No achievements yet. Keep making predictions!
verified_tick_popover_text: This user is a verified member of the community, indicating a commitment to the platform.
verified_modal_text: Gain credibility and visibility in the community with a verified badge.
verified_modal_benefit1: Get a green checkmark next to your name across the site.
verified_modal_benefit2: Your predictions get featured in the "Verified Only" filter on the Explore page.
verified_modal_benefit3: Get recommended as a Verified Expert on relevant Watchlist pages.
verified_status_modal_text: You have increased trust and visibility in the community.
scoring_explained_text1: Our platform uses a **Proximity Scoring System** to reward accuracy. Instead of a simple "correct" or "incorrect," your score is based on how close your prediction was to the actual outcome.
scoring_explained_text2: For example, if a stock is at $152 and you predict it will be $150, you will receive a much higher score than someone who predicted $180. This system is designed to reward thoughtful analysis over random guesses. The maximum score for a perfect prediction is 100 points, with points decreasing the further your prediction is from the final price.
aiwizard_description: Get personalized stock recommendations based on the patterns of our top-performing predictors.
aiwizard_step1_text: Answer a few questions about your investment timeframe and interests.
aiwizard_step2_text: Our system finds top predictors who consistently win in your areas of interest.
aiwizard_step3_text: Receive a curated feed of stocks that our best analysts are watching.
aiwizard_signin_to_join: Sign In to Join the Waitlist
aiwizard_early_access_note: Be the first to know when it launches. Early registrants will get free access for a limited time!
aiwizard_legal_note: **Legal Note:** The AI Portfolio Assist provides insights based on historical user data for informational purposes only. It is not financial advice. All investment decisions should be made with your own research and due diligence.
aiwizard_join_success: You're on the list! We'll notify you on launch.
contact_intro_text: Have a question, feedback, or a partnership inquiry? We'd love to hear from you.
contact_fill_form_text: Fill out the form, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_urgent_text: For urgent matters, you can also reach us directly at:
contact_error_message: Something went wrong. Please try again.

description: Sign in to start making predictions and build your virtual portfolio.
toggle_all_predictions_description: Get a notification for every new prediction made by users you follow.
toggle_short_term_description: Be notified when a followed user makes a significant Hourly, Daily, or Weekly prediction.
toggle_long_term_description: Be notified when a followed user makes a significant Monthly, or longer prediction.
(Price journey visual is not available f: (Price journey visual is not available for this older prediction)
info_collection_text: We collect information to provide and improve our Service. When you register using Google, we receive your name, email address, and profile picture as provided by your Google account permissions.
use_info_text: We use the information we collect to operate and maintain our Service, create your user profile, and communicate with you. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
cookies_text: We use cookies to maintain your session after you log in. A cookie is a small piece of data stored on your computer. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies, but you may not be able to use some portions of our Service.
security_text: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, but we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
cancel_verification_msg: Are you sure? You will lose your verified status and benefits.
msg_no_users_found: No users found for these filters.
could_not_load_stock_data: Could not load data for {{ticker}}. Please try another symbol.
no_top_predictors: No top predictors for this filter yet.
no_active_predictions: No active predictions for this stock yet.

acceptance_of_terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance_of_terms.content: By accessing or using the StockPredictor website ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the Service.

no_financial_advice.title: 2. No Financial Advice
no_financial_advice.content: The information, predictions, and scores provided on this Service are for informational and entertainment purposes only. Nothing on this website constitutes financial, investment, legal, or tax advice. You are solely responsible for your own investment decisions.

user_conduct.title: 3. User Conduct
user_conduct.content: You agree not to use the Service to post or transmit any material which is malicious, defamatory, or otherwise violates any law. You are responsible for all predictions and content posted under your account.

limitation_of_liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
limitation_of_liability.content: In no event shall StockPredictor, nor its directors or employees, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, or other intangible losses, resulting from your access to or use of the Service.

infoModal.title: Time Bonus Explained
infoModal.description: To reward early analysis, a time-based penalty is applied to predictions. The maximum score you can achieve from a prediction decreases as the deadline approaches.

hourlyPredictions.title: Hourly Predictions:
hourlyPredictions.description: The penalty is applied minute-by-minute. The first 10 minutes have no penalty (Max Score: 100). The penalty increases linearly until the last 10 minutes of the hour, where the Max Score is 80.

dailyPredictions.title: Daily Predictions:
dailyPredictions.description: The penalty is applied throughout the trading day. Predictions made right at market open have the highest potential score.

longerTermPredictions.title: Longer-Term Predictions:
longerTermPredictions.description: For Weekly, Monthly, and longer predictions, the penalty is proportional to the percentage of the prediction period that has already passed.

predictionTypes.hourlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current or next trading hour. Ideal for short-term volatility.
predictionTypes.dailyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current or next trading day. A classic timeframe for day-to-day market moves.
predictionTypes.weeklyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current trading week (Friday). Good for tracking weekly trends.
predictionTypes.monthlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current calendar month. Best for capturing monthly momentum.
predictionTypes.quarterlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current financial quarter (e.g., March, June, September, December).
predictionTypes.yearlyDescription: Predict the stock price for the end of the current calendar year. A long-term prediction for major market shifts.

aggressiveness.title: Prediction Style
aggressiveness.noData: No recent predictions with sufficient data.

aggressivenessInfoModal.title: Understanding Prediction Style
aggressivenessInfoModal.description: This meter analyzes the risk level of a user's predictions. The thresholds for each style change based on the prediction's timeframe.
aggressivenessInfoModal.defensiveText: Cautious predictions with small price targets, focusing on consistency (e.g., <3% for Daily, <15% for Yearly).
aggressivenessInfoModal.neutralText: Moderately ambitious predictions that balance risk with potential reward.
aggressivenessInfoModal.offensiveText: Bold, high-risk predictions with large price targets (e.g., >7% for Daily, >35% for Yearly).

market_maven.name: Market Maven
market_maven.description: Awarded for high overall prediction accuracy across all types.

daily_oracle.description: Excelled at predicting the market's daily movements.

monthly_maven.name: Monthly Maven
monthly_maven.description: Proven ability to forecast market trends over a month.

yearly_legend.name: Yearly Legend
yearly_legend.description: Exceptional skill in forecasting year-long market outcomes.

find_member_wizard.trigger_description: Answer a few quick questions about your investment style, and we'll recommend Golden Members who are the best fit for you.
find_member_wizard.step1_description: Tell us which stocks you are most interested in following. This helps us find experts who focus on what you care about.
find_member_wizard.step2_description: How much risk are you comfortable with? This helps us match you with predictors who share your style.
find_member_wizard.step3_description: Are you looking for quick trades or long-term investments?
find_member_wizard.step4_description: Based on your answers, here are the Golden Members we think you'll find most valuable.
